title: New Independent Living 55+ Community with W/D. 1 BR Available!
map_address: 10940 Crooked Lake Blvd. NW near 111th Ave. NW
app_fee: $25 application fee per applicant + $300 application deposit
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'River North Senior Apartments is Coon Rapids, Minnesota’s all-new, premier 55+ independent living senior community!', 'We’ve paid attention to every detail and are offering smart layouts, quality materials, and luxurious amenities seldom found in this price range.', 'Enjoy the comforts of maintenance-free living along with the convenience of an outstanding location.', 'These one, two and three bedrooms feature granite kitchen counters, a private balcony or patio, and a full-size washer and driver in every unit.', 'The community amenities are also perfect for hosting the grandkids and other special events!', 'Community Amenities Include:', "- 9' ceilings", '- Close to downtown Coon Rapids', '- Beautiful structure and quality building materials', '- Granite countertops', '- Built-in microwaves', '- Smoke-free living', '-', 'Near Coon Rapids Dam Regional Park and Mississippi River', '- Large windows', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'River North is a 55 or better senior community and participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,320 | 2', 'Occupants: $56,340 | 3', 'Occupants: $63,360 | 4 Occupants: $70,38.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Make the move today by giving our professional staff a call:', 'show contact info', 'River North', '10940 Crooked Lake Blvd NW', 'Coon Rapids, MN, 55433', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', 'jBH1fsbB5']
